unnormalised: Hey guys, any update on Bumrah? Heard he twisted his ankle pretty bad. Hope he recovers before the next match in Wankhede! Dr. Sharma said it might take 2 weeks, which is cutting it close! Also, what about Hardik? Is that knee injury still bothering him? The team needs him fit! I saw a report estimating the stadium rehab costs at Rs. 50 lakhs for 5000 sq ft. Get well soon, team India! Jai Hind!
normalised: Hey guys, any update on Bumrah? Heard he twisted his ankle pretty bad. Hope he recovers before the next match in Wankhede! Doctor Sharma said it might take two weeks, which is cutting it close! Also, what about Hardik? Is that knee injury still bothering him? The team needs him fit! I saw a report estimating the stadium rehab costs at rupee fifty lakhs for five thousand square feet. Get well soon, team India! Jai Hind!
